lead_paragraph: The Bengals are preparing quarterback AJ McCarron to lead them into the playoffs, where they haven't won a game in 25 years.

headline.print_headline: AJ McCarron Gets Ready to Try to End Bengals' 25-Year Slump
headline.main: AJ McCarron Gets Ready to Try to End Bengals' 25-Year Slump
